snippet.title: Fortuna - Trailer
snippet.description:
WHISHLIST NOW ON STEAM : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2059490/Fortuna/

Fortuna is a roguelite ressource manager with pixel art and a twist: You are a Fate Weaver whose loom seems to randomly weave the threads of destiny, like a slotmachine. But you can influence the Looms of Fate by overseeing your allotted Mortals’ villages and ensuring they have a prosperous life.
